metadata.title: CVE-2018-20365 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: LibRaw::raw2image() in libraw_cxx.cpp has a heap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
